Builds dialog, builds components, calls addComponent, sets layout and sets up listeners.

Parameters:
owner1 - The owner of this dialog.
owner2 - Frame to be the owner of this dialog.
name - The name of values to be displayed.
type - The type of contour scalor.
objects - Array storing the objects to be displayed.
